title: Dynamic Function Access
description: Tests detection of functions that are accessed dynamically via getattr or globals()

dead_items.name: truly_unused
dead_items.reason: Function is never called directly or dynamically

live_items.name: called_via_getattr
live_items.reason: Called via getattr on line 28 and line 36
live_items.notes: Many static analyzers will incorrectly flag this as dead code

live_items.name: called_via_globals
live_items.notes: Many static analyzers will incorrectly flag this as dead code

challenges: Tests tool's ability to handle dynamic function access
Many static analyzers will incorrectly report dynamically accessed functions as dead
